Private Events ABOUT OUR PRIVATE DINING At Grace & Grit, fresh local seafood, Lowcountry cuisine and Southern hospitality embody our locally owned and operated Southern establishment. Located just over the bridge in Mt. Pleasant, Grace & Grit features multiple private dining options, with an ideal location, for whatever the occasion. Our spaces are perfect for rehearsal dinners, bridal and baby showers, business dinners with presentations, celebrations and more. We offer a relaxed and inviting atmosphere with exceptional food, drink and service, and look forward to creating a memorable event for you and your guests. To learn more about our offerings, please contact our Event Coordinator, Eli Kline, at or . She is happy to help create the perfect private event for you and your guests! We're a local, family-run restaurant with a passion for food, our home & community, and of course southern hospitality. Chef owned and driven by Frank Kline, Grace & Grit was opened in August 2017 and focuses on fresh, local seafood and produce, creative & flavorful southern food including our Grit Flight featuring a sampling of our grits, as well as a full bar highlighted by an extensively curated bourbon program.
